des: "A mix of spices and salt. I prefer to use fresh garlic, onions and parsley. But if you like, you can add 1 teaspoon onion powder, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, and 1 tablespoon dried minced parsley to the mix. I also use 1 teaspoon of lemon juice for every teaspoon of seasoned salt to really bring out the flavors."
ins: Pour the salt into a small mixing bowl. Whisk in the sugar, oregano, celery seed, paprika, thyme, turmeric, curry powder, chili powder, marjoram, and mustard until evenly blended. Store in a tightly sealed shaker jar.
